job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Looking for a System Engineer to help build and support the ultimate voice-based conversational AI. We’re looking for coders and creators with a refined code sense: people who’ve built cool things, but also enjoy scaling and operating those things, and who feel proud seeing their code run well in production.
The ideal candidates would have professional experience on a stack serving millions of users, be proficient with Python and/or Golang and have some amount of experience (either professional or personal) in NLP.
Desirable Skills Include:
Microservices Architecture GoPythonML OpsShould be able to apply different tenants' configuration through code as well as tools.
Experience
3-5 years of experience in working with infrastructure as code At least 1 year in Python or GolangComfortable developing, maintaining DevOps pipelinesStrong experience working with cloud services - AWS or GCP preferred Exposure to NLP/AI/ML is a huge plus
Responsibilities
· Be part of on-call rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outages
· Proactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecks
· Choosing tooling for and understanding of CI / CDGCP knowledge
· Kubernetes (In a production environment)DockerKnowledge of working in an Agile environment infrastructure As CodeDevelop, integrate and support features in the core server stack
· Develop and support data pipeline and infrastructure
This is onsite position post Covid in Austin TX.
Permanent position on W2 only.
